subject.name: All Databases
subject.description: The Austin Public Library subscribes to a variety of online resources for your information, education and entertainment.

subject.name: Arts and Humanities
subject.description: Articles and eBooks about art, literature, theater, music, philosophy and religion.

subject.name: Ayuda con las Tareas Escolares
subject.description: EnglishTutores remotos, recursos para reportes escolares, videos con tutoriales y herramientas para investigar en español para estudiantes de todas las edades.

subject.name: Books and Literature
subject.description: Book reviews, literary criticism, author biographies and publishing information.

subject.name: Business and Nonprofits
subject.description: Marketing tools, company and investment information, business plans, directories, interactive maps and metrics.

subject.name: Dictionaries and Encyclopedias
subject.description: Dictionaries and encyclopedias in several languages. Subject-specific encyclopedias for different topics.

subject.name: Directories
subject.description: Contact information for people, nonprofits and businesses in a variety of industries.

subject.name: Do-It-Yourself
subject.description: Crafting, hobbies, home improvement and DIY repair jobs.

subject.name: eBooks and eAudiobooks
subject.description: eBooks and eAudiobooks for your eReaders, computers and other devices.

subject.name: Education and Training
subject.description: Tutorials, courses and practice tests for adult learners. Journal articles about education topics.

subject.name: En Español
subject.description: “En Español” es una página de sitios en línea con contenido o con interfaces en español. Online sites with Spanish-language content or interfaces.

subject.name: Entertainment
subject.description: Online eBooks, audiobooks, comics, magazines, music, TV shows and movies

subject.name: Genealogy and People Search
subject.description: Build your family tree. Find facts about famous people and residential directory information.

subject.name: Government and Statistics
subject.description: Resources covering the government, military and reliable statistics.

subject.name: Health
subject.description: Trustworthy health information.

subject.name: History and Social Sciences
subject.description: Articles, eBooks and primary sources about history, psychology, anthropology, cultures and social issues.

subject.name: Homework Help
subject.description: españolOnline tutoring, school report sources, video tutorials and research tools for K-12 students.

subject.name: Jobs
subject.description: Find a job, apply for a job, improve job skills and research career options.

subject.name: Journals
subject.description: Articles from scholarly and academic journals. Use eJournal Finder to find a specific journal in our online resources.

subject.name: Language Learning
subject.description: Interactive programs and digital audiobooks to learn over 100 languages. ESL options are included.

subject.name: Legal
subject.description: Legal forms for Texas, self-help legal guides and scholarly articles.

subject.name: Magazines & Newspapers
subject.description: Articles from popular magazines & newspapers. Use eJournal Finder to find a specific magazine or newspaper in our online resources.

subject.name: New and Featured
subject.description: Get to know these resources!

subject.name: Science and Technology
subject.description: Articles, tutorials, eBooks and DIY tools in STEM fields.

subject.name: Stream or Download Music
subject.description: Stream or download songs and albums. Find articles about music topics.

subject.name: Texas
subject.description: Links to Texas-specific information.

subject.name: Video
subject.description: Streaming video for entertainment, information, education and training.
